run.module¶

class run.module.Module¶

Bases: run.attribute.attribute.Attribute

meta_attributes¶

Module’s attributes dict-like object.

meta_basedir¶

Module’s basedir.

Define default meta_basedir for all attributes.

This property is:

  • initable/writable
  • inherited from module
meta_cache¶

Module’s caching status (enabled or disabled).

Define default meta_cache for all attributes.

This property is:

  • initable/writable
  • inherited from module
meta_chdir¶

Module’s chdir status (enabled or disabled).

Define default meta_chdir for all attributes.

This property is:

  • initable/writable
  • inherited from module
meta_fallback¶

Module’s fallback.

Define default meta_fallback for all attributes.

This property is:

  • initable/writable
  • inherited from module
meta_is_main_module¶

Module’s main module status (is main module or not).

meta_main_module¶
meta_name¶
meta_tags¶

Module’s tag list.

run.module.AutoModule¶
class run.module.FindModule¶

Bases: builtins.object

class run.module.ModuleAttributes(module)¶

Bases: builtins.dict

get_attribute(name, *, category=<class 'run.attribute.attribute.Attribute'>, resolve=False)¶

Return attribute by given name.

Parameters:
  • name (str) – attribute name, supports nested like “module.attribute”
  • category (None/type/str) – returns attribute only of given class
  • resolve (bool) – if True resolves attribute and returns value
Raises:
  • AttributeError – if module has not attribute for given name
  • TypeError – if attribute is not instance of given category
  • TypeError – if in nested name first attribute is not a Module
Returns:

attribute instance/attribute value
Return type:

run.Attribute/mixed
